verses.verse: Praise <S%H1984><s%> you the Lord <S%H3050><s%>. I will praise <S%H3034><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> with my whole heart <S%H3824><s%>, in the assembly <S%H5475><s%> of the upright <S%H3477><s%>, and in the congregation <S%H5712><s%>.
The works <S%H4639><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> are great <S%H1419><s%>, sought out <S%H1875><s%> of all them that have pleasure in it <S%H2656><s%>.
His work <S%H6467><s%> is honorable <S%H1935><s%> and glorious <S%H1926><s%>: and his righteousness <S%H6666><s%> endures <S%H5975><s%> for ever <S%H5703><s%>.
He has made <S%H6213><s%> his wonderful works <S%H6381><s%> to be remembered <S%H2143><s%>: the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is gracious <S%H2587><s%> and full of compassion <S%H7349><s%>.
He has given <S%H5414><s%> food <S%H2964><s%> unto them that fear <S%H3373><s%> him <S%H5769><s%>: he will ever be mindful <S%H2142><s%> of his covenant <S%H1285><s%>.
He has showed <S%H5046><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%> the power <S%H3581><s%> of his works <S%H4639><s%>, that he may give <S%H5414><s%> them the heritage <S%H5159><s%> of the heathen <S%H1471><s%>.
The works <S%H4639><s%> of his hands <S%H3027><s%> are truth <S%H571><s%> and judgment <S%H4941><s%>; all his commandments <S%H6490><s%> are sure <S%H539><s%>.
They stand fast <S%H5564><s%> for ever <S%H5703><s%> and ever <S%H5769><s%>, and are done <S%H6213><s%> in truth <S%H571><s%> and uprightness <S%H3477><s%>.

He sent <S%H7971><s%> redemption <S%H6304><s%> unto his people <S%H5971><s%>: he has commanded <S%H6680><s%> his covenant <S%H1285><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>: holy <S%H6918><s%> and reverend <S%H3372><s%> is his name <S%H8034><s%>.

The fear <S%H3374><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is the beginning <S%H7225><s%> of wisdom <S%H2451><s%>: a good <S%H2896><s%> understanding <S%H7922><s%> have all they that do <S%H6213><s%> his commandments <S%H8416><s%>: his praise endures <S%H5975><s%> for ever <S%H5703><s%>.
